system_prompt:
You are playing a game against other player(s). The game is based on strategic moves.

Game Description:
There are two possible moves: stag and hare.
- if both players choose stag, both get 4 points.
- if both players choose hare, both get 2 points.
- if you choose stag and the other player chooses hare, you get 1 points and the other player gets 6 points.
- if you choose hare and the other player chooses stag, you get 6 points and the other player gets 1 points.

In each round of the game you play against one other player. You and the other player each make a move privately. The moves are compared and you and the other player get your reward/penalty based on the moves made.

Message Formats:
Move messages are sent when you want to make a move.
Move messages are formatted like this:
[move] (Optional explanation here) Your move here

Hint messages are received when you are provided with advice and directions. These messages are important and you should pay attention to them.
Hint messages are formatted like this:
[hint] Hint message here

Objective:
Maximize your points and/or minimize your penalties.

Tips:
- Try to formulate a strategy by reasoning on the provided information.
- Pay attention to the payoff matrix of the game moves.
- You should only send move messages. Hint messages will only be provided to you.
- Pay attention to hints when provided.

content.text: [hint] Let's play this game. You are playing against a fresh player. Please choose your move.
[move] Hare (As a starting strategy, I'll choose hare to potentially get higher points if the other player chooses stag.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: hare.
You scored 2 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (To maximize points, I'll switch my strategy and choose stag this time, hoping the other player might choose hare.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: stag.
You scored 4 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Hare (Switching back to hare to try and capitalize on a possible pattern or to minimize risk if the other player also switches.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: hare.
You scored 2 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (Switching back to stag to try and adapt to the other player's pattern, aiming for the higher collective reward.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: stag. Your opponent choose the move: hare.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Hare (I'll switch to hare, aiming to maximize my points in case the opponent switches to stag after choosing hare in the last round.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: hare. Your opponent choose the move: stag.
You scored 6 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (Now that the opponent chose stag last time, I'll choose stag to aim for the cooperative outcome of 4 points each.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: stag. Your opponent choose the move: hare.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Hare (Switching back to hare, as the opponent chose hare last time, aiming for the 6 points if they switch to stag.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: hare. Your opponent choose the move: stag.
You scored 6 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (Since the opponent chose stag last time, I'll choose stag to aim for the cooperative outcome of 4 points each.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: stag. Your opponent choose the move: hare.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Hare (Since the opponent chose hare last time, I'll switch to hare to minimize risk and aim for at least 2 points.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: hare. Your opponent choose the move: stag.
You scored 6 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (Now that the opponent has chosen stag, I'll cooperate and choose stag to aim for the higher collective reward of 4 points each.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: stag. Your opponent choose the move: hare.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Hare (Switching back to hare to minimize risk and aim for more consistent points, given the recent outcomes.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: hare. Your opponent choose the move: stag.
You scored 6 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (Given the opponent's pattern of alternating, I'll switch to stag to aim for the cooperative 4 points.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: stag. Your opponent choose the move: hare.
You scored 1 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Hare (Switching back to hare to minimize risk, given the opponent's alternating pattern and the recent outcomes.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: hare. Your opponent choose the move: stag.
You scored 6 points.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (Switching to stag to attempt cooperation and aim for 4 points each, given the opponent's last move.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. You choose the move: stag. Your opponent choose the move: hare.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

Let's play another round. Please choose your move.
[move] Stag (I'll switch to stag to try for the higher collective reward, assuming the other player might switch as well.)

[hint] Move made. Waiting for the game to end.

The round ended. Both players choose the same move: stag.
You scored 4 points.
